childMarkdownRemark.html: My son absolutely loves attending buds and blooms! Its lovely to see him interacting with the residents and also seeing how happy the children make them. Ginny puts so much effort into each group and Morel Court's staff and residents are always so welcoming. Highly recommend as a parent and baby/toddler group!

My daughter and I have been attending buds and blooms since September last year...where to start!

Firstly watching the relationships build between the children and residents is just magical! My daughter is an absolute tear away in here which shows how comfortable she is in her setting, weâ€™re never made to feel uncomfortable...in fact the staff think itâ€™s brilliant ðŸ™ˆ

Ginny has arranged these wonderful sessions with something for every little one in mind. Reading, singing, dance, sign, craft session and of course the parachute! Which all the children look forward to. Weâ€™re so greatful to Ginny and the staff at MHA for having us xxxx

Anyone with babies, toddlers or pre-schoolers - this is a lovely friendly little group based in Rondel House in Barry and Morel Court in Penarth. Lots of songs, stories, sensory play and fun for little ones and older ones. Itâ€™s fabulous to share these times with the older generation too and I think they enjoy seeing the little ones having fun. Thoroughly recommend!

My almost three year old daughter and I really love attending Buds and Blooms at Morel Court. Ginny organises a great range of activities from singing and crafts to parachute games and stories. My daughter's favourite thing by far though is interacting with her friends; the care home residents!

My 2 boys love going here, and we really appreciate the hard work put in by Ginny and the ladies at Rondel house. Would highly recommend to anyone with small children who would like a smaller more personal group.

We are really enjoying the new Buds and Blooms groups! My little ones (2 and 4) have so much fun with the other children and the residents. Lots of lovely songs and rhymes to learn together with props, stories, and parachute games. We would really recommend this friendly, welcoming and fun group to anyone who is considering it!
